testcase.classname: user should be able to sign up with new account successfully
testcase.name: user should be able to sign up with valid credentials successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user click on register link...........................................passed When user fills your personal details with valid data.......................passed And user fills your password field with valid data..........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then user could sign up to his home page successfully and success message is displayed.passed

testcase.classname: users could use login functionality to open their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid username and password............................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: user is able to reset his password
testcase.system-out: Given user click on login button............................................passed And user clicks on ForgotPassword button....................................passed When user enters his valid email............................................passed And user clicks on Recover button...........................................passed Then success message appears to notify the user that all details are sent to his email address.passed
